name: The Offensive Country
description:
Things happen every day. Some are too small to be noticed, others too big to be missed. However, even these things can occasionally get mixed up in the minds of many. This is the story of one of those things.

If you love visual novels, but think all that reading gets old quickly, you might like this game.

Game includes:

Over 1000 words.

Pictures and sprites.

An unholy fusion of game engines.
